1011000101101001 1100010011010010 1 -> sum: 0111011000111100, cout: 1

1101111101100100 0100001100011100 1 -> sum: 0010001010000001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
